SELECT o.product_id productId, o.user_member_id userMemberId, o.order_sn orderSn, o.create_time createTime, o.total_amount totalAmount, o.pay_type payType, o.`status` STATUS, o.order_type orderType, o.receive_address_id receiveAddressId, o.confirm_status confirmStatus, o.delete_status deleteStatus, o.delivery_sn deliverySn, it.product_name productName, it.product_pic productPic, it.total, it.dai, it.product_sku_id productSkuId, it.product_attr productAttr FROM order_order o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.order_sn, i.product_name, i.product_pic, i.product_quantity, i.product_sku_id, i.product_attr, SUM( s.product_quantity ) total, SUM( a.product_quantity ) dai FROM order_item i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_sn, product_quantity FROM order_item WHERE DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ) <= date( create_time ) GROUP BY order_sn ) s ON s.order_sn = i.order_sn LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_sn, product_quantity FROM order_item WHERE order_sn =( SELECT order_sn FROM order_order WHERE DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ) <= date( create_time ) AND status = 3 ) GROUP BY order_sn ) a ON a.order_sn = i.order_sn AND DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ) <= date( create_time ) GROUP BY i.order_sn ) it ON it.order_sn = o.order_sn WHERE DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ) <= date( o.create_time ) AND o.user_member_id =#{userMemberId} AND o.`status`=#{status}
ORDER BY createTime LIMIT ${page},${pageSize}

SELECT o.product_id productId, o.user_member_id userMemberId, o.order_sn orderSn, o.create_time createTime, o.total_amount totalAmount, o.pay_type payType, o.`status` STATUS, o.order_type orderType, o.receive_address_id receiveAddressId, o.confirm_status confirmStatus, o.delete_status deleteStatus, o.delivery_sn deliverySn, i.product_name productName, i.product_pic productPic, i.product_quantity productQuantity, i.product_sku_id productSkuId, i.product_attr productAttr, ra.receive_name receiveName, ra.phone phone, ra.detail_time detailTime FROM order_order o, order_item i, user_receive_address ra WHERE o.order_sn = i.order_sn AND ra.id = o.receive_address_id AND o.user_member_id =#{userMemberId} AND o.order_sn=#{orderSn}
SELECT user_member_id FROM order_order WHERE user_admin_id != user_member_id AND STATUS = 4 AND user_member_id != #{userMemberId} AND user_admin_id =#{userMemberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS payAmount FROM order_order WHERE to_days( create_time ) = to_days( now()) AND STATUS = 4 AND user_admin_id = #{userAdminId}
